name: Deoxys Normal Forme
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys Normal Forme. (Any cards attached to Deoxys Normal Forme, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Deoxys Normal Forme on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Dragonite
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each of your opponent's Pokemon. If that coin flip is heads, this attack does 50 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Froslass
Attack1Text: Discard a Psychic Energy attached to Froslass. During your opponent's next turn, if Froslass would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, the Attacking Pokemon is Knocked Out.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep. Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Giratina
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Giratina during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Gliscor
Attack1Text: Choose either Burned or Poisoned. The Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition. You may return Gliscor and all cards attached to it to your hand.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Heatran
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Fire Energy attached to 1 of your Pokemon to Heatran. This power can't be used if Heatran is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may discard as many basic Energy cards as you like attached to Heatran. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

name: Kingdra
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for as many Water Energy cards as you like, show them to your opponent, and this attack does 10 damage for each Water Energy card you chose. Put those cards on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: You may discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Luxray
AbilityText: If your opponent has any Pokemon LV.X in play, each of Luxray's attacks does 50 more damage to the Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Luxray.
Attack2Text: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to Luxray.

name: Mamoswine
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: You may do 60 damage plus 40 more damage and 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) If you do, Mamoswine does 40 damage to itself.

name: Metagross
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Metagross's Extra Comet Punch attack's base damage is 100.

name: Mewtwo
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Politoed
AbilityText: If you have Poliwag, Poliwhirl, and Poliwrath in play, each of these Pokemon's attacks does 60 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Probopass
AbilityText: Any damage done to Probopass by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 for each Metal Energy attached to Probopass (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't reduce more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack1Text: Choose a number of your opponent's Benched Pokemon up to the amount of Metal Energy attached to Probopass. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Rayquaza
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, search your discard pile for a basic Fire Energy card or a basic Lightning Energy card and attach it to Rayquaza. This power can't be used if Rayquaza is affected by a Special Condition or if you have another Rayquaza in play.
Attack1Text: Discard all Energy attached to Rayquaza.

name: Regigigas
AbilityText: Regigigas can't attack until your opponent has 3 or less Prize cards left.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 120.

name: Spiritomb
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Spiritomb from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on all Pokemon that already have any damage counters on them (both yours and your opponent's). You can't use more than 1 Curse Breath Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokemon to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Yanmega
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage and switch Yanmega with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Armaldo
AbilityText: If Armaldo would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to Armaldo if that damage is 60 or less.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 40 more damage.

name: Azelf
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Azelf from your hand onto your Bench, you may look at all of your face-down Prize cards. If you do, you may choose 1 Pokemon you find there, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then, choose 1 card in your hand and put it as a Prize card face down.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Bellossom
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Vileplume and each Bellossom you have in play. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Cradily
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 30 damage to the new Defending Pokemon. If the Defending Pokemon would be Knocked Out by this attack, you may remove all damage counters from Cradily.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Crawdaunt
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent returns the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand.
Attack2Text: If Crawdaunt has a Technical Machine card attached to it, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Delcatty
AbilityText: If Delcatty is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Delcatty is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Deoxys Attack Forme
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys Attack Forme. (Any cards attached to Deoxys Attack Forme, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Deoxys Attack Forme on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Deoxys's Psychic Boost attack's base damage is 20.

name: Deoxys Defense Forme
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys Defense Forme. (Any cards attached to Deoxys Defense Forme, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Deoxys Defense Forme on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of an attack, and any damage done to Deoxys by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Deoxys Speed Forme
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys Speed Forme. (Any cards attached to Deoxys Speed Forme, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Deoxys Speed Forme on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Ditto
AbilityText: As long as Ditto is your Active Pokemon, its maximum HP is the same as your opponent's Active Pokemon. Ditto can use the attacks of that Pokemon as its own. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.) If that Pokemon is no longer your opponent's Active Pokemon, choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokemon for Ditto to copy.

name: Forretress
AbilityText: Whenever you attach a basic Energy card from your hand to Forretress (excluding effects of attacks), you may flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on each Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's) (excluding any Forretress).
Attack1Text: Forretress does 40 damage to itself.

name: Groudon
Attack1Text: Choose up to 2 basic Fighting Energy cards from your hand and attach them to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fighting Energy attached to Groudon and this attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Heatran
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Metal Energy attached to 1 of your Pokemon to Heatran. This power can't be used if Heatran is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Heatran. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Jirachi
Attack1Text: Search your deck for any 1 card. Shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of your deck.
Attack2Text: Discard all Energy attached to Jirachi. The Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out at the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Kyogre
Attack1Text: Choose up to 2 basic Water Energy cards from your hand and attach them to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Water Energy attached to Kyogre. This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Lopunny
AbilityText: As long as Lopunny is your Active Pokemon, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Benched Pokemon between turns.
Attack1Text: Draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Mesprit
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Mesprit from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Your opponent can't use any Poke-Powers on his or her Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack1Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 50 more damage.

name: Poliwrath
Attack1Text: If Poliwrath was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Poliwrath does 20 damage to itself.

name: Regice
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Discard 2 cards from your hand and choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokemon that isn't an Evolved Pokemon. Then, your opponent switches that Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon. This power can't be used if Regice is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If Regice was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Regigigas
AbilityText: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to Regigigas, remove all Special Conditions from Regigigas.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage and does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Regirock
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Fighting Energy card in your discard pile, you may discard 2 cards from your hand. Then, attach a Fighting Energy card from your discard pile to Regirock. This power can't be used if Regirock is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Registeel
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard 2 cards from your hand. Then, remove 3 damage counters from Registeel. This power can't be used if Registeel is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may discard an Energy card attached to Registeel. If you do, search your discard pile for an Energy card (excluding the one you discarded) and attach it to Registeel.

name: Shedinja
AbilityText: Once during your opponent's turn, if Shedinja would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, you may put 4 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon and each of the opponent's Pokemon that has the same name as the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Put 3 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon. If Shedinja has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Torkoal
AbilityText: As long as Torkoal is your Active Pokemon, prevent all effects, including damage, done to your Benched Pokemon by your opponent's attacks.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Paralyzed.

name: Unown [!]
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Unown ! from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. If tails, put 2 damage counters on 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage. If tails, Unown ! does 10 damage to itself, and this attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Uxie
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Uxie from your hand onto your Bench, you may draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.
Attack1Text: You may put Uxie and all cards attached to it on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Victreebel
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Poisoned. Before applying these effects, you may switch 1 of the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. The new Defending Pokemon is now Burned and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon at the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Vileplume
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a Grass or Psychic Energy card from your hand to Vileplume (excluding effects of attacks or Poke-Powers), you may use this power. If you attach a Grass Energy card, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep. If you attach a Psychic Energy card, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Vileplume is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

name: Anorith
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Anorith by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Camerupt
Attack1Text: Each player discards the top of his or her deck. This attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.
Attack2Text: Camerupt does 20 damage to itself.

name: Castform
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform. (Any cards attached to Castform, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Castform on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: If you have a Stadium card in play, remove 3 damage counters from Castform. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Castform Rain Form
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform Rain Form. (Any cards attached to Castform Rain Form, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) Shuffle Castform Rain Form back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: The defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Castform Snow-Cloud Form
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform Snow-cloud Form. (Any cards attached to Castform Snow-cloud Form, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) Shuffle Castform Snow-cloud Form back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Castform Sunny Form
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for any Castform and switch it with Castform Sunny Form. (Any cards attached to Castform Sunny Form, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) Shuffle Castform Sunny Form back into your deck. You can't use more than 1 Temperament Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Castform Sunny Form.

name: Dragonair
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Drifblim
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Drifblim by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Exeggutor
Attack1Text: Each player counts the number of cards in his or her opponent's hand. Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws a number of cards up to the number of cards his or her opponent had. (You draw your cards first.)
Attack2Text: Discard as many Energy cards as you like attached to your Pokemon. For each Energy card you discarded, flip a coin. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Gliscor
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Grumpig
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused. Put 6 damage counters instead of 3 on the Confused Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Grumpig.

name: Houndoom
AbilityText: If you have less Benched Pokemon than your opponent, each of Houndoom's attacks does 40 more damage to the Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Houndoom.

name: Lanturn
Attack1Text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Lanturn
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon that has any Energy cards attached to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Lanturn.

name: Ledian
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: You may switch Ledian with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, move as many Energy cards attached to Ledian as you like to the new Active Pokemon.

name: Lucario
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Luxio
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Lightning Energy attached to Luxio.

name: Marowak
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Marowak can't use Heavy Bone during your next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Metang
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Metang during your opponent's next turn.

name: Metang
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Mightyena
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon isn't an Evolved Pokemon, that Pokemon can't attack, retreat, or use any Poke-Powers during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokemon you have in play.

name: Ninjask
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you play Ninjask from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon and if your Bench isn't full, you may put Shedinja onto your Bench as a Basic Pokemon from your hand or your discard pile.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in his or her hand, discard a number of cards without looking until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand.

name: Persian
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Piloswine
Attack1Text: You may do 30 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, Piloswine does 30 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Seadra
Attack1Text: You may discard up to 2 Water Energy cards from your hand. If you do, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

name: Starmie
Attack1Text: You may return Starmie and all cards attached to it to your hand.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that has any Poke-Powers or Poke-Bodies. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Swalot
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, count the remaining HP of the Defending Pokemon and Swalot. If the Defending Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than Swalot's, this attack does 80 damage instead.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Swellow
AbilityText: If Swellow has no Energy attached to it, Swellow's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: If Swellow was on your Bench this turn, this attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

name: Tauros
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Tauros you have in play. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, Tauros does 10 damage to itself.

name: Tentacruel
Attack1Text: Search your opponent's discard pile for up to 2 Energy cards and attach them to any of your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like. For each Energy card attached in this way, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If Tentacruel has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokemon, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

name: Unown [J]
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Unown J from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.
Attack1Text: Remove the Special Condition Asleep from the Defending Pokemon.

name: Unown [R]
AbilityText: Once during your turn, if Unown R is on your Bench, you may discard Unown R and all cards attached to it. (This doesn't count as a Knocked Out Pokemon.) Then, draw a card.
Attack1Text: Move any number of basic Energy cards attached to your Pokemon to your other Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Unown [U]
AbilityText: As long as Unown U is on your Bench, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done by your opponent's Pokemon to any Unown on your Bench.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for any 1 card and discard it. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Unown [V]
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 2 damage counters from each of your Pokemon. If you do, your turn ends. This power can't be used if Unown V is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Unown [W]
AbilityText: As long as Unown W is your Active Pokemon, any damage done to your Pokemon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Unown [Y]
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown Y is on your Bench, you may remove 1 damage counter from 1 of your Active Unown and that Unown is now Asleep.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Trainer cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Unown [?]
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Unown ? is on your Bench, you may choose a Pokemon in your hand and put it face down. Your opponent guesses a type of that Pokemon. Reveal that card. If your opponent guessed wrong, draw a card. Then, put that card back into your hand.
Attack1Text: Discard up to 2 cards from your hand. For each card you discarded, draw a card.

name: Beldum
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you attach a Metal Energy card from your hand to Beldum (excluding effects of attacks or Poke-Powers), you may search your deck for Beldum and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Beldum does 10 damage to itself.

name: Beldum
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Bellsprout
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't use any Poke-Powers during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Bellsprout does 10 damage to itself.

name: Buneary
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions and 4 damage counters from Buneary. Buneary is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Chinchou
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Chinchou
Attack2Text: If Chinchou has any Water Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Corphish
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

name: Cubone
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Dratini
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Drifloon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Exeggcute
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 in any combination of Grass Basic Pokemon and Psychic Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Gligar
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Gligar
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Gloom
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that doesn't have any damage counters on it. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Gloom
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Gloom. Gloom is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Gulpin
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Hitmonchan
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if Hitmonchan is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Hitmonchan is Knocked Out), put 4 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If Tyrogue is anywhere under Hitmonchan, this attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

name: Hitmonlee
Attack1Text: If Tyrogue is anywhere under Hitmonlee, you may do 30 damage to any 1 Benched Pokemon instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Hitmontop
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: If Tyrogue is anywhere under Hitmontop, you may switch Hitmontop with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Horsea
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Switch Horsea with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Houndour
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Ledyba
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Ledyba does 10 damage to itself.

name: Lileep
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Lileep.

name: Meowth
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Misdreavus
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Nincada
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Nosepass
Attack2Text: If Probopass is on your Bench, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Numel
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Oddish
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Oddish.

name: Oddish
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Pineco
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Pineco does 50 damage to itself.

name: Poliwag
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Poliwhirl
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Poochyena
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Shinx
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card attach it to Shinx. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Skitty
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Sneasel
Attack1Text: Look at your opponent's hand. If your opponent has any Pokemon Tool or Technical Machine cards in his or her hand, put those cards on top of his or her deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.

name: Spoink
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: You may switch Spoink with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Staryu
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to Staryu and remove 3 damage counters from Staryu.

name: Swinub
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Taillow
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Taillow's Peck attack's base damage is 30.

name: Tentacool
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Tentacool during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Tyrogue
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Hitmonlee, Hitmonchan, or Hitmontop from your hand onto Tyrogue (this counts as evolving Tyrogue) and remove all damage counters from Tyrogue.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage and Tyrogue does 10 damage to itself.

name: Weepinbell
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Yanma
Attack1Text: Switch Yanma with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Yanma during your opponent's next turn.
